item.title: ::players getting error 317 winterlove v.3
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

teh genevoix:

i changed sM to sendMessage but i liked the other cause it showed names and combat levels but changed it and got 3 errors left

I can’t exactly fix everything…
But you can try this one…
Add this somewhere into client.java (there’s no specifics, just not in another method).

public void playersonline() { clearQuestInterface(); for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) { if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { { sendQuest("@bla@Project PK", 8144); //Title sendQuest("@bla@ Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8145); sendQuest("@bla@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName, 8147+i); } } } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Then add this into your commands (remove the old one)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("peopleon") && playerRights >= 0) {
        playersonline();
        sendMessage("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players!");
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::players getting error 317 winterlove v.3
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well. The reason it isn’t working is because that is for a PI and you’re using delta…
Try this?

 if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
			sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
					+ " players!");
			sendQuest("@dre@NAME OF SERVER - Online Players", 8144);
			clearQuestInterface();
			sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
					+ "):", 8145);
			int line = 8146;
			for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
				client playa = getClient(i);
				if (!validClient(i))
					continue;
				if (playa.playerName != null) {
					String title = "";
					if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
						title = "Mod, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
						title = "Admin, ";
					}
					title += "level-" + playa.combatLevel;
					String extra = "";
					if (playerRights > 0) {
						extra = "(" + playa.playerId + ") ";
					}
					sendQuest("@dre@" + extra + playa.playerName + "@dbl@ ("
							+ title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
							+ playa.absY, line);
					line++;
				}
			}
			sendQuestSomething(8143);
			showInterface(8134);
			flushOutStream();
		}

Grabbed from:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/206374-delta-useful-commands.html

Read full topic
